passives.Level 10: Revive with 100% Health. Once per battle.
Using an Upgraded Skill gives 1 AP to all other allies.
passives.Level 20: Almighty Mask gives 2 AP to all allies.

passives.Level 10: Agile Mask applies Rush for 3 turns.
passives.Level 20: +50% Critical Chance while in Agile Mask.

passives.Level 4: Replay instantly when in Almighty Mask.
passives.Level 20: Revive instantly with full Health if dead while in Almighty Mask. Once per Battle.

passives.Level 10: Caster Mask applies Regen for 3 turns.
passives.Level 20: Skills cost 1 less AP while in Caster Mask.

passives.Level 4: Free Aim shots spin the Bestial Wheel to a random value.
passives.Level 10: Free Aim shots deal 100% more damage with all Masks except Almighty.
passives.Level 20: 100% Critical Chance while in Almighty Mask.

passives.Level 10: Heavy Mask applies Shell for 3 turns.
20% increased damage for each consecutive turn without taking damage. Can stack up to 5 times.
passives.Level 20: Break damage is doubled while in Almighty Mask.

passives.Level 10: Balanced Mask applies Powerful for 3 turns.
passives.Level 20: Critical hits deal 30% more damage while in Balanced Mask.

passives.Level 4: Parries increase the Bestial Wheel by 1. Taking damage resets the Bestial Wheel.
30% increased damage per Upgraded Skill used. Resets on using a non-Upgraded Skill.
passives.Level 10: Base Attack spins the Bestial Wheel to a random value.
passives.Level 20: Using an Upgraded Skill gives 1 AP to all other allies.

passives.Level 4: Switch to Almighty Mask on Breaking an enemy.
passives.Level 10: Almighty Mask gives 2 AP to all allies.
